BlockDispatched(uint256,address,uint256,.details: Emitted when a block is dispatched to another chain.

params.adapter: - The adapter address associated with the dispatched block.
params.blockHeader: - The dispatched block header as a bytes32 value.
params.blockNumber: - The block number associated with the dispatched block.
params.targetChainId: - The target chain's identifier associated with the dispatched block.

MessageDispatched(uint256,address,uint25.details: Emitted when a message is dispatched to another chain.

params.adapter: - The adapter address associated with the dispatched message.
params.messageHash: - The dispatched message hash as a bytes32 value.
params.messageId: - The message identifier associated with the dispatched message.
params.targetChainId: - The target chain's identifier associated with the dispatched message.

dispatchBlocks(uint256,address,uint256[].details: Dispatches blocks to a given adapter on the target chaib.

params.blockNumbers: - An array of Uint256 block numbers to dispatch.

returns._0: result - The result returned by the adapter as bytes.

dispatchMessages(uint256,address,uint256.details: Dispatches messages to a target chain using the specified adapter.

params.messageHashes: - An array of bytes32 message hashes.
params.messageIds: - An array of Uint256 message identifiers.

returns._0: result - The result returned by the adapter as bytes.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

dispatchBlocks(uint256,address,uint256[].notice: blockNumbers must include block numbers that are greater than or equal to (currentBlock - 256) due to EVM limitations.

dispatchMessages(uint256,address,uint256.notice: This function can be called only by Yaho
